group_1.textRight: ...Momoko, are you sure it's okay to leave@in the middle of the meeting?

group_1.textLeft: While Shizuka and her friends are explainin'@things to the villagers,
I want us to give Miyo and Yuta@the lowdown.
I've already contacted them@to meet us here.
Speakin' of which...!

group_1.textRight: Momoko...! I'm relieved to hear@you're doing well.
I heard last night was rough on you.@Are you okay?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, it's all good...
Sorry for makin' you guys worry, too.
But thanks to all that, we've got some@good news for you...

group_1.textRight: So that means...
...my hypothesis about the sunken ship@being a trading vessel is true?!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, that appears to be the case.
This is so great, Yuta!

group_1.textRight: [chara:800500:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I can't wait to go see the shipwreck@myself!
And that bracelet you guys brought back!

group_1.textLeft: And now for you, Miyo.

group_1.textRight: Huh? What?

group_1.textLeft: I dunno how soon it'll be...
But it looks like the village custom'll@be changing shortly.
As we speak, Shizuka and the others@are discussing it with the elder.

group_1.textRight: Really...?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, really!
And once that's changed, you'll be free.
Can you hang on tight just a little bit longer?

group_1.textRight: Yes...! I can wait as long as I need to!
Thank you, Momoko...!
I'm so lucky to have met you, and that@all of you helped me...
I'm so blessed...!
If the custom changes, I'll be happy, too...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:800200:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What? You, too...?

group_1.textRight: Yeah! Because the reason it's changing...
...is because of me, right?
Dad will be so proud...!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:800200:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]I was SO stupid to get my hopes up!

group_1.textRight: Wh-what...?
Oh dear...looks like they're in for@a storm of their own.

group_1.textLeft: Ahaha...
Well, we'll be returnin' to Kamihama@come noon.
But if you need anything from us, just@reach out and we'll be happy to help.

group_1.textRight: ...Can I ask you guys something, actually?

group_1.textLeft: What is it?
[chara:101001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]WHAT?!
Oh my...!

group_1.textRight: What is it? What are you talking about?

group_1.textLeft: It's nothing you need to hear, Yuta!

group_1.textRight: Ah, okay...!

group_1.textLeft: Th-that means you're gonna confess@TODAY?
Won't be long before the tradition officially@changes...

group_1.textRight: Since you two helped me...
I feel like I can find the courage now.
So please - watch over me while I confess...!

group_1.textLeft: But...

group_1.textRight: It's alright, Momoko.
The tradition is changing no matter what.
It doesn't matter if it's a little late@getting there.

group_1.textLeft: If that's what you think...[chara:101001:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101001:cheek_0][chara:101001:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json:eyeClose_1][chara:101001:lipSynch_1]then alright.
We've got your back, Miyo!
